headline: [Latest] Global Chemical Reagents Market Size/Share Worth USD 26.5 Billion by 2034 at a 7.5 CAGR: Custom Market Insights (Analysis, Outlook, Leaders, Report, Trends, Forecast, Segmentation, Growth Rate, Value, SWOT Analysis)
summary: [220+ Pages Latest Report] According to a market research study published by Custom Market Insights, the demand analysis of Global Chemical Reagents Market size & share revenue was valued at approximately USD 14.1 Billion in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 14.8 Billion in 2025 and is expected to reach around USD 26.5 Billion by 2034, at a CAGR of 7.5 between 2025 and 2034. The key market players listed in the report with their sales, revenues and strategies are Thermo Fisher Scientific, Merck

headline: Should Thermo Fisher Scientific's (TMO) New Sustainable Facility Shift Investors' Outlook on Long-Term Revenue Growth?
summary: Thermo Fisher Scientific recently opened a state-of-the-art, 375,000-square-foot carbon-neutral manufacturing center in Mebane, North Carolina, expanding its capacity to produce at least 40 million laboratory pipette tips per week and introducing advanced automation capabilities. This facility, alongside the launch of eco-friendly and innovative Nalgene GloWyld bottles, underscores Thermo Fisher's increased emphasis on sustainability and responsiveness to evolving customer demands in both...
